title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta.
Add egg-cheese mixture, stir quickly and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in spices & yogurt overnight.
Grill or fry chicken until golden.
Cook onions, add tomato puree & spices.
Add cream, simmer, then mix in chicken.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy meal with crisp vegetables tossed in a savory sauce.
steps: Add garlic & ginger, fry until fragrant.
Add all vegetables, stir fry quickly.
Add soy sauce and toss well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
